features: Ultra light mesh panels on the sides and underarms
Skin protection factor (SPF) 50 on the back
Flattering fit : Not too tight, with a longer back for full coverage
3 back pockets and a side zip pocket
Extremely soft and light fabrics with anti-odour properties for enhanced breathability and moisture management. Worry free fit, garanteed!
A soft, anti-slip silicone elastic will keep the jersey in place while you ride, providing an unparalleled fit
Your peace of mind is our top priority! Keep your personal items safe, thanks to a secure zip pocket, ideal for your phone, keys and cards
You can count on our reflective accents to keep you visible and safe in low-light conditions.
